Government announces rollout of roadside drug testing legislation, police expected to undertake 50,000 tests per year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/government-announces-rollout-of-roadside-drug-testing-legislation-police-expected-to-undertake-50000-tests-per-year/3GL7TGH3CRGVJCTO74K6GCQI74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/government-announces-rollout-of-roadside-drug-testing-legislation-police-expected-to-undertake-50000-tests-per-year/3GL7TGH3CRGVJCTO74K6GCQI74/ Benjamin PlummerThe legislation would give police power to randomly screen drivers for drugs. Photo / Warren Buckland
